item.description:
KAYAK, CANOE AND STAND UP PADDLE BOARD DEMO DAY
Call 603-753-9804 For More InformationÂ 
WWW.CONTOOCOOKCANOE.COM

CRCC's 14TH ANNUAL ON WATER DEMO DAY IS SUNDAY, MAY 19th.
ALL CANOES, KAYAKS & STAND UP PADDLE BOARDS WILL BE ON SALE. THE LARGEST ON WATER DEMO IN NEW HAMPSHIRE.
COME OUT AND TRY AS MANY CANOES, KAYAKS AND STAND UP PADDLE BOARDS AS YOU WANT. OVER 200 BOATS WILL BE AVAILABLE TO DEMO.

TIME: 10:00AM TO 4:00PM

MANUFACTURES ATTENDING
KAYAKS: OLD TOWN, WILDERNESS SYSTEMS, CURRENT DESIGN, OCEAN, NECKY, PERCEPTION, DAGGER, EDDYLINE, VALLEY, LINCOLN, P AND H, VENTURE AND FEEL FREE
CANOES: WENONAH, LINCOLN, MAD RIVER AND OLD TOWN
STAND UP PADDLE BOARDS: BIC, SURFTECH, BOARDWORKS, TAHOE, ODYSSEY AND RIVIERA

NOTE: This is an event hosted by Contookook River Canoe Company and although there is a time listed it is an all day event. You can post in the comments section to indicate when you will be attending and if you would like to get together with others from this group while there.
item.name: KAYAK, CANOE AND STAND UP PADDLE BOARD DEMO DAY
